the culprit, from HTMLFormSaveAction.java

FIXME: org.apache.xpath.compiler.XPathParser seems to have problems when
namespaces are not declared within the root element. Unfortunately the XSLTs
(during Cocoon transformation) are moving the namespaces to the elements which
use them! 
One hack might be to parse the tree for namespaces (Node.getNamespaceURI),
collect them and add them to the document root element, before sending it
through the org.apache.xpath.compiler.XPathParser (called by XPathAPI)
creator: gregor@apache.org
